description: Attributes associated with a service code. These attributes can be unique to the city/jurisdiction.

service_code.description: unique identifier for the service request type

items.description: A single attribute extension for a service

variable.description: If only used to present information to the user within the description field or if that user input is needed

datatype.description: Type of field used for user input. According widgets will be picked for user inputs

required.description: If attributes value required to submit service request

datatype_description.description: Description of the datatype which helps the user provide their input

order.description: Sort order that the attributes will be presented to the user. 1 is shown first in the list.

description.description: description of the attribute field with instructions for the user to find and identify the requested information

items.description: Possible value for ServiceAttribute that defines lists

key.description: Unique identifier associated with an option for singlevaluelist or multivaluelist (analogous to the value attribute in an html option tag).

name.description: Human readable title of an option for singlevaluelist or multivaluelist (analogous to the innerhtml text node of an html option tag).
